keyMoments.title: Reveals Heart Swap Deal with Law
keyMoments.description: Caesar reveals that he knows all of Law's plans through Monet's surveillance and that Vergo now possesses Law's heart while Caesar holds Smoker's heart, exposing Law's critical vulnerability.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Caesar's manipulative nature and reveals the depth of his alliance with Doflamingo. Shows how Caesar has been one step ahead of Law throughout the arc.
keyMoments.quote: Thanks for naively giving me your heart in exchange for Monet's heart as part of our contract, Law!

keyMoments.title: Tortures Law by Squeezing His Heart
keyMoments.description: After Law insults his intelligence, Caesar becomes enraged and grabs Law's heart, squeezing it until Law passes out from the pain.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Caesar's sadistic and petty nature, willing to torture even allies who slight his ego.

keyMoments.title: Broadcasts Weapons Demonstration to Underworld
keyMoments.description: Caesar commences a worldwide broadcast to weapons dealers and underworld brokers, preparing to demonstrate his new weapon of mass destruction and explain Smiley's origins.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Caesar's ambitions to become the premier weapons dealer in the New World and his connections to the criminal underworld.

keyMoments.title: Explains Smiley's Creation
keyMoments.description: Caesar reveals that Smiley was created from the H2S poison gas bomb that devastated Punk Hazard four years ago, condensed into slime form and fed the Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl.
keyMoments.significance: Connects Caesar directly to the disaster that destroyed Punk Hazard and reveals his method of creating living weapons from Devil Fruits.

relationships.description: Caesar betrayed Law by revealing he holds Law's heart and has been spying on him through Monet.

evolutionMoments.description: Caesar reveals he has been manipulating Law all along and tortures him by squeezing his heart.

relationships.description: Vergo works with Caesar and holds Law's heart for him as part of their alliance with Doflamingo.

reveals.information: Caesar has been spying on Law through Monet and holds leverage over him through his heart
Caesar created Smiley by condensing the H2S poison gas from four years ago and feeding it a Devil Fruit
Caesar is conducting weapons demonstrations for underworld brokers and arms dealers

name.japanese: トラファルガー・D・ワーテル・ロー

keyMoments.title: Caesar Reveals He Holds Law's Heart
keyMoments.description: Caesar reveals that Law gave him his heart in exchange for Monet's heart as part of their alliance agreement, and that Vergo now possesses Law's heart while Caesar holds Smoker's.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Law's critical vulnerability and explains why he has been operating so carefully. This is a major setback to Law's plans and shows the danger of his alliance with Caesar.

keyMoments.title: Tortured by Heart Squeezing
keyMoments.description: Vergo and then Caesar squeeze Law's physical heart, causing him to scream and thrash in agony before passing out from the pain.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the horrifying effectiveness of Law's own Ope Ope no Mi powers being used against him and emphasizes his desperate situation.

relationships.description: Law's alliance with Caesar is revealed to have been a manipulation, with Caesar holding Law's heart as leverage.

evolutionMoments.description: Caesar reveals he has been spying on Law and holds his heart, then tortures him.

reveals.information: Law's heart is held by Caesar/Vergo, making him vulnerable to torture and control
Law made a deal with Caesar to exchange his heart for Monet's heart as part of their alliance

keyMoments.title: Revealed to Hold Law's Heart
keyMoments.description: Caesar reveals that Vergo now possesses Law's heart, which was given as part of Law's alliance agreement with Caesar.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Vergo's deep involvement in Caesar's operations and his role as Doflamingo's enforcer at Punk Hazard.

keyMoments.title: Tortures Law by Squeezing His Heart
keyMoments.description: Vergo squeezes Law's physical heart, causing Law to scream and thrash in his restraints, demonstrating his sadistic nature.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Vergo's cold, professional cruelty and his willingness to torture former allies without hesitation.

relationships.description: Vergo works with Caesar as part of Doflamingo's operation at Punk Hazard.
Vergo holds Law's heart and uses it to torture him.

reveals.information: Vergo is actively working with Caesar and holds Law's heart as leverage

keyMoments.title: Regains Her Senses and Resists the Drug
keyMoments.description: Mocha begins resisting the addictive drug NHC10 and regains her memories of Nami and Usopp's rescue attempt. Despite withdrawal symptoms causing hallucinations (seeing people with snake, frog, and lizard heads), she realizes the Straw Hats were trying to save the children.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the first time one of the kidnapped children breaks free from Caesar's drug control, setting up Mocha's eventual heroic sacrifice to protect the other children.

relationships.description: Mocha remembers Nami trying to rescue her and the other children from Caesar.
Mocha remembers Usopp trying to rescue her and the other children from Caesar.

reveals.information: Mocha is able to resist the addictive drug and regain her senses, showing her strength of will

keyMoments.title: Caesar Reveals Smiley's Origin
keyMoments.description: Caesar reveals that Smiley was created from the H2S poison gas bomb that devastated Punk Hazard four years ago. He condensed the gas into slime form and fed it the Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl Devil Fruit.
keyMoments.significance: Explains the creation of one of the arc's major threats and connects to Punk Hazard's tragic history.

keyMoments.title: Devours the Giant Candy
keyMoments.description: Ignoring Caesar's commands to wait, Smiley devours the massive piece of candy containing the Shinokuni substance, triggering its transformation.
keyMoments.significance: Triggers the transformation that will create Shinokuni and reveals Caesar's lack of true control over his creation.

reveals.information: Smiley was created from the H2S poison gas from the Punk Hazard disaster four years ago, condensed into slime and fed a Devil Fruit
